lines.text:
[talking to the director of the film about his own acting]
Let's do one for real. Do you want it dirty like this? I'm sorry, Glauber.
Tyrants are always good at bed.

[the director off camera shouting at the actors of how the scene should be made]
Speak up Danuza!
This is the sewer of universe. We are doomed! An atomic implosion has taken place at the Earth's core. A war between denizens of the abyss. Our structure have been destroyed, our foundations shaken.
